text: I've said this regarding other DK2 remixes, but it shall be repeated. This, my friends, is what you get when you take a bunch of ecstasy pills, cram them into a SNES game slot and slide the power switch on. I've never done ecstasy, but I imagine I would hear endless loops of this if I did.

author: gamewizl

text:
@ocremix Thanks for the reply!  I don't doubt that the original tune is in there; I think often, I am just not musically trained enough to recognize it.  A lot of people may be in that same situation.  

I still think that personally, I prefer remixes that are closer to the original tune, because of the memories associated with those tunes.  But that's just a personal preference.  Again, thanks for replying, and keep up the good work!
author: drunyon214

text: @SupraDarky I know exactly what you mean.  It's not that OCRemix songs are poorly composed... they are certainly well made. It's just that I prefer the memories and sounds of the original tune, rather than hearing a song I can barely even recognize.
author: drunyon214
